amendment.description: To authorize the Governors of the States to elect to participate in the renewable fuel program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 844 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 62. Record Vote Number: 204.

action.text: Amendment SA 844 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 539. (consideration: CR S7204-7211, S7219; text: CR S7204) To authorize the Governors of the States to elect to participate in the renewable fuel program.
